title: [1.7.2][ssp/smp][MMO汉化]Weird Mobs Mod 奇异怪物模组—诡异音效—丧心病狂
author: MMO
txt_content:
本帖最后由 MMO 于 2014-6-21 22:40 编辑 


【写在前面】
这个mod加入了一些比较奇怪的怪物，作者脑洞过大的感觉，其中不乏一些精神污染的怪物，因为貌似也是新出的mod，所以对服务器的兼容性不知道怎么样。一开始我觉得这个mod的怪物都挺萌的，后来就感受到了作者深深的恶意(＃°Д°)

【mod介绍】
新加了16种不同寻常的怪物


Big Ear  大耳兽
这个和狼差不多，可以驯服，但是要把他打的只剩下1血然后后金碇，就可以驯服了。驯服后眼睛变成绿色。可以做护甲

【mod原文（怕哪里说错了，英语渣跪了QAQ）】
Big Ear: This mob works similar to the wolf. But if you dont tame him he will always be hostile. When he attacks he deals 1 heart of damage. You can tame him with golden ingots and his eyes will turn green and when he is sitting down they will be yellow. Drops Big Ear Skin when killed. Butter Monger: This is a hostile mob that does one heart of damage when he hits you. Crazy Bird: The Crazy Bird it probably one of the weirdest mobs in the mod. He walks around as a peaceful animal and makes weird sounds. But if you are holding some valuables (Diamonds, Gold ingot or Iron ingot) in your hand, he will follow you and if you right click him with it, he will replace it with seeds and run away! Cyclops Man: The Cyclops Man is a hostile mob and runs very fast. He does 1.5 hears of damage when he hits you. Fat Fish: There really isn’t much to say about this creature besides that he is fat and lives in water… He will drop fish when killed. Fat Man: The Fat Man was actually the first mob we made for Weird Mobs Mod. He is about one block in size and runs fast. When he hits you he will deal one heart of damage. When killed, he drops nothing at the moment. That will be fixed very soon. Drops Chicken when killed. Knife Man: This is also a really weird mob. It is a one block sized monster that has to blades spinning around him. He will deal two hearts of damage when he hits you and drops 1 – 2 iron swords when killed. Potion Stick: This is a stick with som poisons on it. When he hits you, you will get poison, weakness and slowness effects and loose 1.5 hearts. If youre on normal difficulty the potions will last for 10 seconds but if youre on hard they will last for 30. You wont get any potion effects when yore on easy. Drops sticks when killed. In the future he will drop poison sticks that can be used as weapons. Spinning Feets: The Spinning Feets is a really weird mob. Hes Legs spins like wheels and if he stands still on grass for to long, the grass will turn into dirt. He is peacefull and currently does not drop anything. Stick Man: The Stick Man is a friendly creature that follows you if you’re holding a book. You can also breed them with the book and they will create a Stick Man Baby! It will take about 7000 – 8000 game ticks for the baby to grow unless you use paper to speed it up. Drops paper (and a book if you’re lucky) when killed. Tall Man: The Tall Man was the second mob that we added to this mob. He is five and a half blocks tall and moves slowly. But when he hits, he will do three hearts of damage. When he dies there is a small chanse of him dropping an ender eye. Vest Creeper: This is a creeper with an enormous exploding radius. His explotions are three times bigger than a normal creeper. And because he has a vest on him, he also has more health. He has 25 hearts and when killed he will drop TNT. Villager Head: This is a very strange mob. He is hostile and does one heart of damage when he hits you. He drops flies (for no reason at all) when killed. Walking Radio: The Walking Radio is just a normal friendly animal playing music all over the place. Drops music disks when killed. Currently it drops way to many and to often that it should do. It will be fixed soon. Whither Creeper: The Wither Creeper is the most dangerous mob in the mod. He is much like the wither boss but with less health and is much smaller. If you manage to kill him he will drop a Nether Star Piece.
